text:
@JoyAnnReid The founders of America, created it for Europeans.
Native Americans.
Africans.
Hispanics...were never seen as EQUAL or WORTHY of dignity.
A war had to be fought for Africans FREED from slavery.
That sentiment is STILL in America. 🇺🇸
#coronavirus 

@Morning_Joe @CNN @axios @MSNBC
